item.title: 5 Horror Movies Based on True Stories
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 5 Horror Movies Based on True Stories 5 Horror Movies Based on True Stories G6 Stories 01 Annabelle The Conjuring franchise's favourite demonic doll is real in the sense that a real-life Raggedy Anne doll named Annabelle amctheatres.com 02 The Conjuring The Conjuring movies are based on the real life exploits of paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren. imdb.com 03 The Amityville Horror The Amityville Horror franchise started out leaning into the idea that it was a true story really hard, but over time got sillier and sillier.

item.title: Top 5 Best Hollywood Movies in 2022
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Top 5 Best Hollywood Movies in 2022 Top 5 Best Hollywood Movies in 2022 G6 Stories 05 Thor Love and Thunder Thor Love and Thunder is a comic adventure film starring Natalie Portman, Christian Bale, Chris Hemsworth, and Taika Waititi. 04 The Batman The Batman series is an action film starring Robert Pattinson as Batman, directed and distributed by Matt Reeves and Warner Bros. Pictures, DC Films Production companies.
